name: FlyingCube
description:
Welcome to FlyingCube itch.io website!

What is FlyingCube?

FlyingCube is a game that still under development. Its about a game that you dont have to touch another object! if so, you lose.

How to play the game?

Simply, just use W = Up A = Left D = Right to move around!

I apologize if you get any bugs during the gameplay and stuff. If you found so, you can join my main discord server https://discord.com/invite/z8ZdNJ6 and you can DM me instanly to report the bug since im gonna working on the discord server later.

and sorry if its kinda bad because im new to these programming stuff.

Ok thats it, have a great day gamer!
